Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 52nd overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 2019...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2019, off Julian Ritchie (LA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/10/2019, off Jermaine Moore (TOR)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/4/2019, hitting .607 with 2 HR, 3 RBI...
Hit for the cycle against Los Angeles on 9/17/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/18/2019, hitting .462 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 2/3/2021 to a 3-year deal worth $5,300,000 per year...
Injured on 5/31/2021 with a Broken Foot, out for 8 weeks...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2021, hitting .359 with 5 HR, 18 RBI...
